title: Clarus Viewer Engine Helpers
description: Clarus Viewer Engine Helpers is an Unreal Engine 5 plugin that enables spawning actors from non-actor BPs and managing Config files.
longDescription:
Engine Helpers is an Unreal Engine 5 plugin that provides helper functions in Blueprints and C++ for spawning actors from non-actor Blueprints and managing Config files.


Also provided is a C++ function used to load levels on the server side for multiplayer.
technicalDetails:
Features:

·      Load all classes from a given directory

·      Spawn class from non-actor Blueprint without implicit world context

·      Handles multiplayer loading of different levels

·      Create and edit Config files

·      Save and Load String data from a config file

·      Save and Load String Array data from a config file

 

Number of Blueprints: 1

Number of C++ Classes: 3

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Documentation: https://www.clarusviewer.com/index.php/advancing-education/
